EmailTemplate.description: To send ITS invoice without 3rd party backup
EmailTemplate.name: ITS Invoice
EmailTemplate.subject: International Trip Support Invoice(s)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Attached please find your invoice(s) for International Trip Support.
If you have any questions or need further assistance please let us know. Thank you,
GoDirect Flight Services Accounts
Honeywell | Aerospace
GoDirect Flight Services
602.365.7020 x6
fssaccounts@honeywell.com
https:\\ aerospace.honeywell.com
